name: @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin
notes: @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin is an ESLint plugin that provides lint rules for TypeScript code. Part of the TypeScript ESLint tooling ecosystem for code quality checking during development. Like ESLint itself (@eslint/*, eslint-plugin-*, eslint-config-*), this is a build-time/development tool for linting TypeScript code, not a runtime library. Used in .eslintrc configuration files and by ESLint CLI during development/CI pipelines.
